reasoning: Acute Chagas' disease incidence estimated at 0.8 per 100k globally based on WHO and Pan American Health Organization estimates. Acute phase is relatively rare compared to chronic prevalence; most transmission occurs in endemic areas of Central/South America.
source: Stanaway JD et al. (2016). The global burden of chagas disease: a systematic review and modelling study. Lancet Infect Dis. 16(11):1270-1281
